lead_paragraph: The TV Sports column on Tuesday, about coverage of the Mets’ farewell to Shea Stadium on Sunday, misidentified the broadcaster and former player who said he had forgotten the view from the field and how the fans surrounded the players. He is Keith Hernandez, not his fellow SNY broadcaster Ron Darling.
